“AAA Security Fencing.”

“Yeah, hi, my boss wants a quote on a...unique sort of perimeter defense.”

“Can you describe it?”

Sure. It’s a 2000-mile long moat, filled with snakes and/or alligators. And maybe machine gun trenches?”

“...”

“Yeah never mind. Forget I called.”
